plot: Myriam is a bright and adventurous young girl taking any opportunity to escape her everyday life by trail hiking. However, during one of her usual hikes, the unexpected occurs.
title: Le bourreau des innocents
plot_es: Myriam is a bright and adventurous young girl taking any opportunity to escape her everyday life by trail hiking. However, during one of her usual hikes, the unexpected occurs.
plot_en: Myriam is a bright and adventurous young girl taking any opportunity to escape her everyday life by trail hiking. However, during one of her usual hikes, the unexpected occurs.
